welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Wolfenbuttel, a charming city filled with rich history and beautiful scenery. Get ready to explore and experience all that this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Braunschweig Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Braunschweig Airport, primarily used for charter and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
